Overview   Service  Command 

Service zimbraSync

Command Summary
CancelPendingRemoteWipe Cancel a pending Remote Wipe request. Remote Wipe can't be canceled once the device confirms the wipe. [NetworkEdition only]
GetDeviceStatus Get status for devices. [NetworkEdition only]
RemoteWipe Request a device (e.g. a lost device) be wiped of all its data on the next sync. [NetworkEdition only]
RemoveDevice Remove a device. This will not cause a reset of sync data, but will cause a reset of policies on the next sync. [NetworkEdition only]
ResumeDevice Resume sync with a device if currently suspended. This will cause a policy reset, but will not reset sync data. [NetworkEdition only]
SuspendDevice Suspend a device from further sync actions. [NetworkEdition only]
